name: FCPXHost
desc: A protocol that provides an interface to retrieve the Final Cut Pro timeline proxy objects and details of the host app.

items.name: var bundleIdentifier: String
items.desc: A unique string that identifies a host app to the system.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: The name of the host app.

items.name: var timeline: FCPXTimeline?
items.desc: A pointer to the Final Cut Pro timeline proxy object.

items.name: var versionString: String
items.desc: The version number of the host app.
